bibliothek.gui.dock.themes.basic.action

Class BasicSeparatorHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • bibliothek.gui.dock.themes.basic.action.BasicSeparatorHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ViewItem<JComponent>, BasicTitleViewItem<JComponent>, MenuViewItem<JComponent>

    public class BasicSeparatorHandler
extends Object
implements BasicTitleViewItem<JComponent>, MenuViewItem<JComponent>
    A handler that shows a JSeparator for a SeparatorAction.
    Author:
    Benjamin Sigg
